title: 1,455-Piece Lego Lion King Set Is Over 50% Off This Week
description: Lego: The Lion King - Young Simba (1,445 pieces) $64.39 (was $130) See at Target See at Amazon ($92) See at Walmart ($92) Lego: The Lion King - Simba Cub (222 pieces) $16 (was $20) See at Amazon See at Walmart Target's Circle Week sale has several outstanding deals on Disney Lego sets, but the best offer is on the Young Simba display model. This 1,445-piece Lion King Lego set is on sale for a best-ever price of $64.39 (was $130) for Target Circle members. To get the deal, you simply need to sign up for the free rewards program.On Target's site, Young Simba looks like a 30% discount due to the retailer listing the MSRP as $92, but Lego's actual retail price for Young Simba is $130, which means you're saving over 50% with this deal. Amazon and Walmart are offering the 20% discount that drops the price to $92, but needless to say, you should grab Target's deal before it sells out. It's unlikely to remain in stock for the full sale, which ends July 12 and is competing with Amazon Prime Day 2025 this week.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Young Simba is one of a handful of stellar Disney Lego set deals in Target's Circle Week sale.

Target's Circle Week sale has several outstanding deals on Disney Lego sets, but the best offer is on the Young Simba display model. This 1,445-piece Lion King Lego set is on sale for a best-ever price of $64.39 (was $130) for Target Circle members. To get the deal, you simply need to sign up for the free rewards program.On Target's site, Young Simba looks like a 30% discount due to the retailer listing the MSRP as $92, but Lego's actual retail price for Young Simba is $130, which means you're saving over 50% with this deal. Amazon and Walmart are offering the 20% discount that drops the price to $92, but needless to say, you should grab Target's deal before it sells out. It's unlikely to remain in stock for the full sale, which ends July 12 and is competing with Amazon Prime Day 2025 this week. Lego: The Lion King - Young Simba (1,445 pieces) $64.39 (was $130) The completed 1,445-piece Simba model stands over 11.5 inches tall when completed. It's part of Lego's black box model series for adults, so it's primarily designed to be a display piece. That said, it does have a movable head, so Simba can strike a few different poses.Lego's Young Simba building set is a faithful replica of its on-screen counterpart, and it’s an easy recommendation at this new low price point. If you need help piecing together the project, it works with the Lego Builder app, allowing you to zoom in and rotate the model to get a better look at how everything snaps together. Lego: The Lion King - Simba Cub (222 pieces) $16 (was $20) If the Young Simba Set looks enticing but is a bit too expensive (or complex), check out the smaller and more affordable Simba Cub Set. Discounted to $16 (was $20), the 222-piece set builds a 4-inch replica of Simba. It’s also more posable than the Young Simba Set, with a rotating head, movable legs, and swiveling tail. You’ll also find a few accessories with the set, making it both a display piece and a tiny playset for young fans of The Lion King. For classic Disney fans, check out the 1,103-piece Magic of Disney display model for $70 (was $100) at Target. You can also get the charming 811-piece Walt Disney Tribute Camera fro $67.19 (was $100) at Amazon or Target. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Target's Circle Week sale has several outstanding deals on Disney Lego sets, but the best offer is on the Young Simba display model. This 1,445-piece Lion King Lego set is on sale for a best-ever price of $64.39 (was $130) for Target Circle members. To get the deal, you simply need to sign up for the free rewards program.

On Target's site, Young Simba looks like a 30% discount due to the retailer listing the MSRP as $92, but Lego's actual retail price for Young Simba is $130, which means you're saving over 50% with this deal. Amazon and Walmart are offering the 20% discount that drops the price to $92, but needless to say, you should grab Target's deal before it sells out. It's unlikely to remain in stock for the full sale, which ends July 12 and is competing with Amazon Prime Day 2025 this week.

Lego: The Lion King - Young Simba (1,445 pieces)

$64.39 (was $130)

The completed 1,445-piece Simba model stands over 11.5 inches tall when completed. It's part of Lego's black box model series for adults, so it's primarily designed to be a display piece. That said, it does have a movable head, so Simba can strike a few different poses.

Lego's Young Simba building set is a faithful replica of its on-screen counterpart, and it’s an easy recommendation at this new low price point. If you need help piecing together the project, it works with the Lego Builder app, allowing you to zoom in and rotate the model to get a better look at how everything snaps together.

Lego: The Lion King - Simba Cub (222 pieces)

$16 (was $20)

If the Young Simba Set looks enticing but is a bit too expensive (or complex), check out the smaller and more affordable Simba Cub Set. Discounted to $16 (was $20), the 222-piece set builds a 4-inch replica of Simba. It’s also more posable than the Young Simba Set, with a rotating head, movable legs, and swiveling tail. You’ll also find a few accessories with the set, making it both a display piece and a tiny playset for young fans of The Lion King.

More Disney Lego Deals at Amazon and Target

Beyond these two great Lion King sets, several other Lego Disney builds are available for substantial discounts thanks to Target Circle Week. For classic Disney fans, check out the 1,103-piece Magic of Disney display model for $70 (was $100) at Target. You can also get the charming 811-piece Walt Disney Tribute Camera fro $67.19 (was $100) at Amazon or Target. Meanwhile, Pixar fans can save over 50% on the iconic house from the movie Up.

Target Circle Week Disney Lego Deals:

  • The Lion King: Young Simba (1,445 pieces) -- $64.39 ($130)
  • Walt Disney Tribute Camera (811 pieces) -- $67.19 ($100) | Amazon
  • Pixar's Up House (598 pieces) -- $27.64 ($60) | Amazon
  • Lego Ideas: Magic of Disney Display Model (1,103 pieces) -- $70 ($100) | Target Exclusive
  • Encanto Isabela's Flowerpot (641 pieces) -- $25.59 ($40)
  • Moana's Flowerpot (619 pieces) -- $32 ($40) | Target Exclusive
  • Duplo Ariel's Magical Underwater Palace (116 pieces) -- $47.59 ($80)

More Disney Lego Deals:

Amazon is offering its first-ever discount on Lego's model kit featuring the lovable rooster from Moana 2.

  • Moana 2 - Heihei (566 pieces) -- $32 ($40)
  • Moana’s Adventure Canoe (529 pieces) -- $48 ($60)
  • Moana's Island Fun Playset (175 pieces) -- $16 ($20)
  • Lilo and Stitch - Stitch (730 pieces) -- $48 ($65)
  • The Lion King - Simba Cub (222 pieces) -- $16 ($20)
  • Inside Out 2 Mood Cubes (394 pieces) -- $28 ($35)
  • Frozen - Elsa's Ice Palace (630 pieces) -- $85 ($100)
  • Encanto - The Magical Madrigal House (1,560 pieces) -- $128 ($160)
  • Encanto - Mini House (186 pieces) -- $16 ($20)
  • Snow White's Jewelry Box (358 pieces) -- $36 ($45)
  • Disney Princess - Ariel's Crystal Cavern (141 pieces) -- $24 ($30)
  • Disney Princess - Maleficent's Dragon Form (583 pieces) -- $45 ($70)
  • Disney Princess - Ultimate Adventure Castle (698 pieces) -- $98.47 | Retired
  • Disney Advent Calendar 2024 (253 pieces) -- $28.45 ($45)

The Lion King Blu-ray Deals:

Fans of The Lion King who want to add the movies to their personal Blu-ray collections can get the original film and the 2019 live-action remake on 4K Blu-ray for super cheap at Amazon. The Steelbook Edition of the latest film in the series, Mufasa: The Lion King, is in stock at Amazon for $45, but you may want to opt for the standard Blu-ray edition due to its low $15.33 price. Make sure to click the coupon box on the listing to get the full discount.

  • The Lion King (4K) -- $15 ($35)
  • The Lion King live-action remake (4K) -- $10 ($31)
  • Mufasa: The Lion King Steelbook Edition (4K) -- $45
  • Mufasa: The Lion King (Blu-ray) -- $15.33 ($41) | Click coupon
  • The Lion King 3-Movie Collection (DVD) -- $27.47 ($56)
